about_the_game:
Welcome aboard, Captain! Prepare to embrace this demo and taste the most galactic sexual experience ever! Explore the vast expanse of the cosmos and search for the hottest and most horny space girls across the galaxy.

Bring gorgeous women to your research vessel and customize their looks in your bio-metrics laboratory, experiment on them in your high-tech test chamber with a selection of sex toys to please them in your Cyber-Masturbatorium, enjoy and have fun as you become the most outstanding scientist and sexual explorer in the universe!

You can create your beloved characters' presets in this demo and import them into the full game! A loyal crew will always follow you, Captain!

content_descriptors.notes:
Captain Hardcore contains nudity, realistic sexual simulations, mild violence and strong language.

All in game characters are over the age of 18.

name: Captain Hardcore Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: All Steam VR Headsets + Vive Trackers
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • VR Support: All Steam VR Headsets + Vive Trackers
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get a taste of the galactic customization and sexual exploration that awaits you in this Captain Hardcore demo. Board your ship and explore the darkest reaches of the universe in search of the lustiest and lewdest space sluts in the universe, all in the name of science!
